name: Arcane Folder prototype
description:
This is a proof of concept for a game I have been working on for a while.

Arcane folder is a game where you create custom abilities from components you find through your journeys and use them to fight enemies.  

Abilities are constructed from one or more stages. A stage are made up from these distinct components

  • Method (how you deliver your stage)
  • Effect (what effect your stage has)
  • Modifier (optional modification to your stage)
  • Trigger (when the stage will be triggered)
